price: كه چېرې هغه درنه وغواړي او ټينګار در باندې وكړي بيا به تاسي بخيلي وكړئ او ستاسي كينې به راڅرګندې كړي.
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
